tweets.author: Cameron Wolfe
tweets.text:
Dolphins WR Tyreek Hill (oblique) caught some passes off JUGS machine & worked out alongside RB De’Von Achane (calf, won’t practice this week) on stationary bike but neither practiced.

LB Jaelan Phillips is practicing. TE Darren Waller (PUP list) not practicing yet.

tweets.author: Adam Schefter
tweets.text:
More about the Colts naming Daniel Jones as their starting QB over Anthony Richardson, via @HolderStephen:

https://t.co/IUaycq6bOr

tweets.author: Tom Pelissero
tweets.text: Coach Shane Steichen informed the quarterbacks this morning of his decision. Daniel Jones will start and Anthony Richardson — the No. 4 overall pick two years ago who has battled a string of injuries  — will back him up.

tweets.author: Ian Rapoport
tweets.text: Daniel Jones is the #Colts starter, as the organization makes a dramatic shift away from Anthony Richardson.

tweets.author: Ian Rapoport
tweets.text: The #Colts have named Daniel Jones as their starting QB. https://t.co/lBrE80zZF7
